w :  good morning !  may i speak to mr .  wang ?
w :  mr .  wang  this is liu li of the hua mei company .  there will be a fashion show on the 1 st of may .  i ' d like to invite you and your photographic team to come here .
m :  marvelous !  i ' d love to .  when will we arrive ?
w :  we will send you invitation cards and i will need to know the size of your team .
m :  we have a total of 10 .
w :  ok .  then i ' ll send you the cards .  see you .

question: what will there be on the 1 st of may in the hua mei company ?
choice: there will be a fashion show .
there will be a press conference .
answer: there will be a fashion show .
